RelatedSentence: Ireland has come from being one of the weakest countries in the euro zone but now in an upwards rating cycle , Ireland should do better than its current peers , said Peter Schaffrik , head of European rates strategy at RBC .
Moody 's upgraded Ireland 's credit rating from Baa3 to Baa1 after European markets closed on Friday , bringing its view into line with the other two main ratings agencies .
